p.span:
Belmond-Klemme CSD is preparing for Students/Families to pick up items that were left in lockers at the Elementary and Junior/Senior High School.
Below is information for Jacobson Elementary.
BK 7-12 grade information will be coming soon

br.em: If you have any questions, please call the building offices.

p.strong: Plastic bags with a student I.D. sticker or tag with each students notebooks, clothing and other school materials will be placed outside at the front entrance and will be available for pickup between 8 a.m. and 3:00 p.m. on the date assigned below.

Parents who are not able to pick up their student materials on the date below may contact the office AFTER the assigned date to schedule a time for pickup using social distancing guidelines now in place. If you have multiple students in the building, please pick up on the day designated for your youngest students teacher.

All books that are currently in student lockers and desks will be returned either to the library or the individual teacher. If a student has a personal book belonging to the school, please notify the office or drop it off in the atrium with a note for the students teacher.
